name: GeoKill
description:
This is GeoKill. A game where you are a brave square and fight against other geometric bosses. But in every level, you start without guns, so your task is to collect you gun and kill the boss!

Instructions: D or Right Arrow: walk right A or Left Arrow: walk left W or Up Arrow: raise the gun S or Down Arrow: lower the gun Space: Jump Shift, Ctrl or Tab: Shoot

Development notes:

The game is developed by Felipe Guimarães and Octavio Mathias. We are Brazilian students from ITA, and here we have a game development group called ITAbits. Unfortunately, we ran out of energy on Saturday here on our dormitories, so we lost one day of development and the game couldn’t be polished with everything we planned for it (as audio, animations and more complexity on the fights).

Thank you for playing. =)
